page.title: 16FARMING(Part 1)
page.content: The block is mainly a farming one with several farms over 130 hectares with one or two small ones which are farmed on a part time basis.Most of the farms are about 200 years old but one can trace it's origins back 1000 years.The average number of employees is one per farm.The busiest time for all the farmers is from{June}to{October.}All the farms are arable with most having animals of some sort.Only two of the farms have{dairy cattle}but most have{ {beef cattle.}The dairy cattle are expected to produce up to{40 litres}of milk a day.Only one farm has sheep, the breeds being{Dorset Horn}and{ {Suffolk.}The sheep are sheared in{ {July.}None of the farms keep chickens on a commercial basis only for a private supply of eggs.
